library.title: Game Library
library.emptyStateAction: Add some games to get started

toast.batchDeleteConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} games? This action will remove them from the library but won't delete local game files.

gameCard.startFailedLog: {{name}} failed to start, check logs for help

addGameModal.title: Add Game
addGameModal.coverImagePlaceholder: Enter image URL or select local image
addGameModal.coverImageSupportTip: Supports remote URL and local image selection

toast.fetchMetaFailed: Failed to get metadata, please check network or token validity
toast.fetchByIdFailed: Failed to get metadata via ID, please check network or token validity
toast.fetchMetaByIdFailed: Failed to get metadata via ID

addGameModal.coverPlaceholder: Enter image URL or select local image
addGameModal.coverHint: Supports remote URL and local image selection

batchImportModal.title: Batch Import Game Library
batchImportModal.scanHint: The application will scan first-level subfolders. Each folder containing executable files will be recognized as a game.
batchImportModal.matchHint: To prevent triggering rate limits, matching speed might be slow. Please be patient.

playnite.title: Import from Playnite
playnite.desc: Select JSON file exported from Playnite
playnite.hint: Supports JSON game data files generated through Playnite export scripts

potatovn.title: Import from PotatoVN
potatovn.desc: Select ZIP file exported from PotatoVN
potatovn.hint: Supports PotatoVN backup files containing data.galgames.json

gameImportModal.noPathHint: There are {{count}} games without a local path. They may be network games or already removed.
gameImportModal.noPathHintCheck: Checking this will skip these games.
gameImportModal.noPathHintUncheck: Unchecking this will import these games (without launch paths).
gameImportModal.doNotCloseWarning: This may take some time, please do not close the window
gameImportModal.skipNoPathHint1: There are {{count}} games without a local path. They may be network games or already removed.
gameImportModal.skipNoPathHintUncheck: Unchecking this will import these games (without launch paths).
gameImportModal.skipNoPathHintCheck: Checking this will skip these games.
gameImportModal.importHint: This may take some time, please do not close the window

game.deleteConfirmMsg: Are you sure you want to delete the game "{{name}}"? This will remove it from the library but keep your local files.

gameBackup.title: Save Backup
gameBackup.pathPlaceholder: Please set the save path (file or folder) in the Edit page first
gameBackup.cloudConfigHint: Go to settings to configure cloud backup and sync your saves

modal.restoreMsg: Are you sure you want to restore the backup from {{time}}? Current save will be overwritten.
modal.deleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this local backup? This action cannot be undone.
modal.restoreCloudMsg: Are you sure you want to restore {{name}} from the cloud? Current save will be overwritten.

toast.savePathRequired: Please set the save path first

gameLaunch.executableHint: LunaBox uses this executable to launch the game. This is the path you initially selected.
gameLaunch.processHint:
Specify the actual game process name (including .exe extension).
If not specified, LunaBox attempts to monitor the executable path. If the selected file is a launcher, you'll need to manually select the actual process when prompted.
Fill this in advance to avoid selecting it every time.
gameLaunch.leDesc: Simulate a Japanese locale environment to launch the game, fixing text encoding and region lock issues.
gameLaunch.leNotConfigured: Please configure LEProc.exe path in settings first
gameLaunch.magpieDesc: Automatically launch Magpie after the game starts for full-screen super-resolution upscaling.
gameLaunch.magpieNotConfigured: Please configure Magpie.exe path in settings first

toast.lePathRequired: Please configure Locale Emulator path in settings first
toast.magpiePathRequired: Please configure Magpie path in settings first

modal.deleteSessionMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this play session? This action cannot be undone.

gameEdit.name: Game Name
gameEdit.coverPlaceholder: Enter image URL or select image
gameEdit.coverHint: Supports remote URL and local image selection
gameEdit.savePathHint: You can specify the game's save directory or file for cloud backup and cross-device sync
gameEdit.sourceIdPlaceholder: Enter the game ID corresponding to the platform

home.title: Home
home.noPlayRecordHint: Go to the game library and pick a game to start

categories.title: Collections
categories.systemLocked: System collections cannot be batch deleted

toast.deleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete the collection "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
toast.batchDeleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} collections? This action cannot be undone.

basic.bangumiTokenHint: Required if you want to use the Bangumi data source
basic.timezoneHint: Used to correctly display and record play time. Restart the app after changing.
basic.closeToTray: Minimize to system tray on close

appearance.enableBgHint: When enabled, uses a custom image as the app background and auto-adjusts the theme colors
appearance.hideGameCoverHint: When a custom background is enabled, hide the last-played game's cover on the home page
appearance.bgImageHint: Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, WebP, BMP formats. You can crop the image after selection.
appearance.opacityHint: Adjust the overlay opacity of the content area. Lower values make the background more visible.

game.recordActiveOnlyHint: When enabled, play time is only recorded when the game window is in the foreground focus. This provides a more accurate measure of actual play time, excluding idle and background time.
game.warningItem1: Enabling this records incomplete runtime of the game process (excluding background time)
game.warningItem2: Existing play records are not affected by this setting
game.warningItem3: Some fullscreen games may affect the accuracy of focus detection
game.autoDetectProcessHint: When enabled, if the launcher process exits quickly, LunaBox will automatically prompt you to select the actual game process. When disabled, it uses the saved process name or executable handle for monitoring, suitable for single-exe games or scenarios that don't require complex detection.
game.lePathHint: Once set, you can enable Locale Emulator region switching in the game edit interface
game.magpiePathHint: Once set, you can enable Magpie super-resolution upscaling in the game edit interface

cloudBackup.enableHint: Sync your data to cloud storage
cloudBackup.passwordForIdHint: Used to generate your user identifier
cloudBackup.passwordWarning: Important: The password can only be set once and cannot be changed. Please remember it.
cloudBackup.clientIdHint: To customize, register an app in
cloudBackup.authWaitHint: Please complete authorization in the browser. The app will return automatically upon success.
cloudBackup.retentionHint: Maximum number of backups to keep per game in the cloud
cloudBackup.oneDriveNoteItem1: Uses the project-provided Client ID by default for out-of-the-box convenience
cloudBackup.oneDriveNoteItem2: Your data is stored entirely in your own OneDrive account's app folder, inaccessible to others
cloudBackup.oneDriveNoteItem3: All sensitive data (e.g. Refresh Token) is stored locally and never uploaded to the cloud
cloudBackup.oneDriveNoteItem4: The author is not responsible for any issues arising from the use of the default Client ID
cloudBackup.oneDriveNoteItem5: For higher security, you can customize the Client ID below

toast.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

autoBackup.backupDbOnExit: Auto backup database on app exit
autoBackup.backupDbOnExitHint: Automatically creates a database backup when the app closes, protecting your game library data
autoBackup.backupSaveOnExit: Auto backup game saves on game exit
autoBackup.backupSaveOnExitHint: Automatically backs up the save directory when the game process ends (requires save directory to be set first)
autoBackup.autoUploadDb: Auto upload database backups to cloud
autoBackup.autoUploadDbHint: Automatically uploads the database backup to cloud storage after creation (requires cloud backup to be enabled)
autoBackup.autoUploadSave: Auto upload game save backups to cloud
autoBackup.autoUploadSaveHint: Automatically uploads the save backup to cloud storage after the game exits (requires cloud backup to be enabled)
autoBackup.localGameRetentionHint: Maximum number of backups to keep per game locally
autoBackup.localDbRetentionHint: Maximum number of database backups to keep locally

ai.systemPromptPlaceholder: Enter a custom AI system prompt...
ai.systemPromptHint: The AI will generate statistical summaries based on this prompt. Click a preset above to fill quickly.

dbBackup.sectionHint: Back up game library metadata, categories, play records, and other app data
dbBackup.cloudNotEnabledHint: Configure cloud backup above to sync the database to the cloud

modal.restoreMsg: Are you sure you want to restore to this backup? The app will exit and complete the restore on next launch.
modal.deleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this local backup? This action cannot be undone.
modal.restoreCloudMsg: Are you sure you want to restore this cloud backup? The app will exit and complete the restore on next launch.

toast.backupSuccessCloud: Database backed up and uploaded to cloud successfully
toast.restoreScheduled: Restore scheduled, app will exit shortly...

fullDataBackup.hint: Backs up app config, database, covers & backgrounds, image cache, logs, and local backup directory
fullDataBackup.warningHint: Ideal for backing up before major changes or migrating data between devices. Restoring will overwrite existing data — proceed with caution.

toast.restoreScheduled: Full restore scheduled, app will exit shortly...

update.autoCheckLabel: Auto check for updates on startup
update.autoCheckHint: Automatically checks for a new version when the app starts (at most once per day)

passwordModal.title: Set Backup Password
passwordModal.desc1: The backup password is used to generate your unique user ID and encrypt cloud data.
passwordModal.desc2: The password can only be set once and cannot be changed!
passwordModal.desc3: Please remember your password. Forgetting it will make it impossible to restore cloud backups.
passwordModal.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

ai.title: AI Analysis
ai.summarizeFailed: AI summary failed. Please check your AI configuration.

templateExport.title: Export
templateExport.selectTemplateHint: Choose a template to beautify your statistics
templateExport.tipText: Tip: You can create custom HTML templates in the templates directory

toast.selectDateRange: Please select a start and end date
toast.startBeforeEnd: Start date must be before end date
